com.neu.prattle.websocket

Class ChatEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.neu.prattle.websocket.ChatEndpoint

  • public class ChatEndpoint
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class ChatEndpoint. This class handles Messages that arrive on the server.

      • directedMessage

        public static void directedMessage(Message message)
        Direct message. Send a Message to the user specified in the to field
        Parameters:
        message - - message to send

      • broadcast

        public static void broadcast(Message message)
        Broadcast. Send a Message to each session in the pool of sessions. The Message sending action is synchronized. That is, if another Message tries to be sent at the same time to the same endpoint, it is blocked until this Message finishes being sent..
        Parameters:
        message - - a message to broadcast

      • broadcastToSession

        private static void broadcastToSession(Message message,
                                       javax.websocket.Session session)
        broadcastToSession Send a Message to the user specified in the to field
        Parameters:
        message - - message to send
        session - - a session to send the message

      • onOpen

        public void onOpen(javax.websocket.Session session,
                   java.lang.String username)
            throws java.io.IOException,
                   javax.websocket.EncodeException
        On open. Handles opening a new session (websocket connection). If the user is a known user (user management), the session added to the pool of sessions and an announcement to that pool is made informing them of the new user. If the user is not known, the pool is not augmented and an error is sent to the originator.
        Parameters:
        session - the web-socket (the connection)
        username - the name of the user (String) used to find the associated UserService object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        javax.websocket.EncodeException - the encode exception

      • addEndpoint

        private void addEndpoint(javax.websocket.Session session,
                         java.util.UUID uuid)
        Adds a newly opened session to the pool of sessions.
        Parameters:
        session - the newly opened session
        uuid - the user who connected

      • onMessage

        public void onMessage(javax.websocket.Session session,
                      Message message)
               throws java.io.IOException
        On message. When a message arrives, broadcast it to all connected users.
        Parameters:
        session - the session originating the message
        message - the text of the inbound message
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - - an ioexception

      • getSessionFromField

        public java.lang.String getSessionFromField(javax.websocket.Session session)
        Returns the correct from field for a message from the given session
        Parameters:
        session - the session originating the message
        Returns:
        String - from field for message

      • onClose

        public void onClose(javax.websocket.Session session)
        On close. Closes the session by removing it from the pool of sessions and broadcasting the news to everyone else.
        Parameters:
        session - the session

      • onError

        public void onError(javax.websocket.Session session,
                    java.lang.Throwable throwable)
        On error. Handles situations when an error occurs. Not implemented.
        Parameters:
        session - the session with the problem
        throwable - the action to be taken.
